name: Bomb Fighterz
description:
Bomb FighterZ is a local two or online four player bomberman like game, where you need to use abilities and bombs in order to destroy your opponent.


Implemented Features:
  • Abilitysystem
  • Punch your friends (and foes)
  • Bomberman like gameplay
  • Leveleditor
  • Localization (German and English) [Custom Localization possible]
  • Local Versus for 2 player
  • Online Versus (up to 4 player) [Currently worked on!]

Multiplayer in Bomb FighterZ works with up to four players. One player has to host the game, while the other three players can join him through his external ip and the set port. In order for that to work, you either need to forward your ports (see portforwarding) or use a virtual private network (like hamachi). If you play with people in the same lan, just use your internal ip address and everything will work fine.
